casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Rashid A. JOHNSON Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 5, 2017

Daniel J. Foster, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn. App. 328, 157 A.3d 120 (2017), is denied.
